entry.title: Friday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Near blizzard developing after midnight. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Near blizzard. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the afternoon then mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
